titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to allow producers to extend for one year loans for the 1985 and 1986 crops of wheat, feed grains, and soybeans.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

bill.summary: 3/15/1988--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Agriculture to permit producers to extend for one year loans under the Agricultural Act of 1949 for the 1985 and 1986 crops of wheat, feed grains, and soybeans.
